website_summaries.verdict: Designed for daily running and uptempo training, the Under Armour Micro G Speed Swift is equipped with the necessary technologies for enhanced performance. It delivers the right amount of cushioning, traction and protection. Though a few users have issues with the fit and sizing, the shoe is still considered by some as a worthy investment.
pros: The Under Armour Micro G Speed Swift is a fast and lightweight shoe
Some reviews mentioned that the shoe provides enough cushioning and stability
Some testers liked the sleek design of the Micro G Speed Swift
This shoe is very comfortable to wear
cons: Some runners felt that this shoe is too narrow for them
Some mentioned that this shoe runs small

customer_reviews.title: Huge Under armour fan but...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these running shoes to replace my asics as I begin training for a half marathon. First of all, they fit fantastic, feel comfortable, light and breathable. I've not been for a proper run in these yet, as I prefer to break my trainers in with walks first and after a few long walks I found my feet did ache a little. Definitely not something I'd experienced with my asics. I'm no fitness expert, but personally I would recommend these trainers more for gym goers than running enthusiasts, for the price though they are a worthy addition to your collection.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Smith

customer_reviews.title: Loved them
customer_reviews.text: These were great pair of trainers, I used them for various sports & they performed every time.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas M.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect but then the squeak came
customer_reviews.text: These shoes started off great looking better than expected. But wasn't long before they make a really annoying squeaking sound with every walk. Going to have to bin them
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for the price, some of the most comfortable trainers I have bought in years, this is my 2nd pair, and I am thinking of getting a 3rd. Anything even close to equivalent from competitive brands would be much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Constantinos C.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but a half size too small
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe and very light but it came up half a size too small imo. I'm a very definite 9 1/2 in a Nike and I need a 10 in these.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Paradise

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely
customer_reviews.text: Excellently fitting and beautifully comfortable, I am very very happy with these trainers and I historically struggle to get good fitting shoes. These fit perfectly for my size (10.5).
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: The fit is good, but after one or two runs the black ...
customer_reviews.text: The fit is good , but after one or two runs the black insole bit came off and the foam underneath is quite grippy so my sock doesnt slide in anymore it's harder than it should be to put my foot in the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Luke Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fit.
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfy trainers, Quality is as expected from the Under Armour brand.
customer_reviews.author: User 42 left hand

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really lightweight running shoes, well worth the money. Delivered quickly. Size is very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion these trainers are excellent fit round your feet best I've ever had no ...
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion these trainers are excellent fit round your feet best I've ever had no joke 5 stars all the way👍
customer_reviews.author: Yid1

customer_reviews.title: I this as a gift for my Son he loves ...
customer_reviews.text: I this as a gift for my Son he loves them never took them off. Says there light and very confortable
customer_reviews.author: Kez

customer_reviews.title: Dwayne Johnson rocks these.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes, would never switch from underarmour ever. It's the best for gym and they're so comfortable. The size is as expected although a bit tighter as they're running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fz

customer_reviews.title: but a comfortable gym shoe and very light
customer_reviews.text: not enough shock absorbtion if you are a serious runner, but a comfortable gym shoe and very light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband wore these everyday for our holiday he said they were very comfy he really likes them
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers. I use them in the gym and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers. I use them in the gym and find they give me great support while running and lifting weights
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour trainers
customer_reviews.text: Best trainers I have ever owned, and a whole lot cheaper than Nike!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. Lilley

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Use them at the gym and give good ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Use them at the gym and give good support.
customer_reviews.author: TheThree

customer_reviews.title: but great for mid to forefoot runners
customer_reviews.text: 20 k long runs, absolutely no issue. I have a weak ankle, and these feel very stable. Not much cushioning, but great for mid to forefoot runners.
customer_reviews.author: Sergiu Buciuc

customer_reviews.title: as woman I loved them, very comfy for the gym
customer_reviews.text: I got those trainers for myself, as woman I loved them, very comfy for the gym, nice trainers.
customer_reviews.author: mr c grainger

customer_reviews.title: good fit and support
customer_reviews.text: use these in the gym regularily : good fit and support.Generally very pleased with product
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice trainers. I use them for cycling and i am very happy with them. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Stan

customer_reviews.title: they're nice shoes but the inner sole's on the flatter side ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent fit, they're nice shoes but the inner sole's on the flatter side as far as running shoes go but quite good for the price I paid!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. D. Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price for this shoes and very comfortable . But u must buy 1no bigger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, light and very resistant
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are extremely comfortable and seem very sturdy, while at the same time light. I was worried about the size since I had been reading few disappointing reviews on amazon, however, I got a 11.5 UK (my size is 46.5 EU) and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Enrico Berardo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good value. Bought for my son as he spends quite some time on the tread mill, at the gym. He has found them much better for this than his normal addidas everyday trainers. He's found it has helped him run further. Did buy some extra inner soles to give more support to the arch of his foot though. Overall, a decent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than average, lighter than air.
customer_reviews.text: Acutally, I don't like them, but my hubby loves them. They are incredibly lightweight, which is what he wanted for the gym. Don't think they will last for a lot of walking or road use, the look like more indoorsy type shoes. Think indoor bowls or something else like it. Under armour they might be, but they don't look tough at all. But then they were also a third of their average price, so bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Lewis

product_meta.title: Under Armour Ua Micro G Speed Swift, Men's Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Lightweight, breathable mesh locks down your foot and increases ventilation.overlays add structure and support without adding bulk.antimicrobial treatment applied to minimize the risk of odor causing bacteria and infectious fungus.full-length micro g foam turns cushioned landings into explosive takeoffs.strategically placed rubber traction covers high impact zones for greater durability with less weight. Non-marking rubber outsole delivers greater traction with less weight.
